Package curam.util.common.domain

Provides support for domain plug-ins that includes simple life-cycle management and supports a shared, thread-local plug-in context.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Domain
    A domain and its associated information.
    DomainNames
    An interface defining constants for the names of the infrastructure domains.
    DomainNames.Core
    Core domain names are supported by the infrastructure, but they are not necessarily root domains.
    DomainNames.Root
    Root domains do not share a common ancestor domain and provide the base from which all other domains are derived directly or indirectly.
    DomainOptions
    An interface to access the options that can be specified for a domain in the UML model.
    DomainPlugIn
    A simple interface for all domain plug-ins.
    Domains
    An interface to a collection of domains providing access to domains in the domain hierarchy by name and supporting the addition of new domains.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDomainPlugIn
    A base class for domain plug-ins that provides simple life-cycle management and supports a shared, thread-local plug-in context.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DomainException
    Exception class for domain hierarchy problems.

Package curam.util.common.domain Description

Provides support for domain plug-ins that includes simple life-cycle management and supports a shared, thread-local plug-in context.
